message: I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I think you'll find it's a great investment. I'm willing to sell it to you for $20000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $18000 for the product.

I understand you're looking to get a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $18000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $19500, but that's as low as I can go. I think you'll find it's a fair price for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm still exploring my options and would like to keep the price as low as possible. I am willing to pay $19000 for the product.

I'm still not willing to go below $19500, but I'm willing to meet you at $19250. This is my final offer, and I think it's a fair price for the product. If you're not interested, I'll have to consider other options.
